text: The Federation of National Specialty Societies of Canada is an organization of national specialty societies in Canada created in 2004 and it is based in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. It provides a forum for national specialty societies to discuss issues related to accessible medical specialty care in Canada. Morris Freedman, past president of the Canadian Neurological Society, is the current vice-president.University of Toronto - News@UofT - Briefly Noted - Awards and Honours == See also == * Specialty Registrar * American Board of Medical Specialties == References == ==External links== *The Federation of National Specialty Societies of Canada Canada Category:Medical and health organizations based in Ontario
title: Federation of National Specialty Societies of Canada
